dotfiles¶

dotfiles is a tool, used to deploy an awesome develop and operation environment.

How to Install¶

Install dependency:

pip install -r requirements.txt

Clone this repository to your laptop:

cd $HOME
git clone https://github.com/crazy-canux/dotfiles.git

Install all tools and config them follow the user guide.
